prompts.prompt: Create a web app named uValue. It's a valuation app with three basic models: a conventional cost of capital Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) model, an Adjusted Present Value (APV) model, and a dividend discount model. The app should have both detailed and simple versions for the cost of capital and APV models. In the detailed versions, users have full control over all input levers, while in the simple versions, many input levers are set to safe defaults.
